document.heading: Health Services Planning and Certificate of Need Program Temporary Amendment Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-133, the “Health Services Planning and Certificate of Need Program Temporary Amendment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and Assigned Bill No. 11-560. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 6, 1996, and March 5, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 21, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-240 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-133 became effective on May 29, 1996.
